title: Lady Gaga tweets that she doesn't know what 'fortnight' is
text:
Lady Gaga has been keeping busy with the next leg of her Las Vegas residency about to start and her new Haus Laboratories makeup line, but she caused a minor uproar on Tuesday when she admitted to not knowing what the hit video game Fortnite is.

The 33 year old singer took to Twitter on Tuesday morning, with a simple question: 'What is fortnight,' with many assuming she's discussing the video game despite spelling it incorrectly.

Just five hours after sending the tweet, it has gotten over 16.7K responses and over 111.8K retweets, with one of the first responses coming from the top-ranked Fornite player in the world, Tyler 'Ninja' Blevins.

'Call me on the Telephone. I'll give you a Million Reasons to play. You and I,' Ninja said, referencing Gaga's songs Telephone, Million Reasons and You and I.

Actor Sebastian Roche chimed in and told Gaga, 'You don't want to know..' of the addicting game.

Rapper Juicy J said it's, 'A very addictive video game that you can't stop playing once you enter.'

Even Twitter Gaming got in on the fun, stating Fortnite is, 'The ARTPOP of video games,' referring to Gaga's 2013 album.

Video game streaming platform Twitch responded by stating, 'We have some friends that can show you...'

There are some who believe that Gaga may have been 'trolling' with that tweet, since she admitted last year that she is a gamer.

In a tweet from late November 2018, Gaga updated her followers about her progress in playing the video game Bayonetta.

'Still playing #Bayonetta middle of chapter XIII and my hands hurt and I have to sleep and it's 4 In the damn morning but this damn dragon with the face that I have to kill with my weave,' Gaga began.

'Smh. Give it another go in the morning #gamer respect to the experts I need emotional support,' she added.

Gaga likely won't have much time for gaming since she's just days away from launching Leg 3 of her Enigma residency in Las Vegas.

The third leg kicks off October 17 at the Park Theater at the Park MGM resort in Las Vegas.

The third leg wraps up November 9, with a brief break before the small fourth leg that takes place between December 28 and December 31.
description: Lady Gaga has been keeping busy as of late, but she caused a minor uproar on Tuesday when she admitted to not knowing what the hit video game Fortnite is.
